verbs.description: [ARG1: reform to statute of limitations] [V: comes] [ARGM-DIR: down] [ARG4: to the wire] the state senate is poised to reconvene on wednesday for its last scheduled session day and is expected to tackle the statute of limitations reform bill pennsylvania state senate pennsylvania jim vansickle senate pennsylvania senate joe scarnati diocese of erie united states senate berks county statute of limitations rep mark rozzi republican party united states joseph b scarnati rep mark rozzi president berks county pennsylvania gop david poulson
